description: Sharp lemon and salty capers make the perfect topping for buttery BBQ scallops. Ask your fishmonger to prepare these on the half shell.
name: BBQ Scallops with Lemon & Caper Butter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 scallops, in half shell, roe on

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the barbecue to medium high. Mix the garlic and butter together in a small bowl and add a tablespoon to each scallop shell.
Cook the shells on the barbecue for 5 minutes. Mix the lemon juice, capers and parsley together in a small bowl and drizzle over each scallop before serving.
